welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vyshhorod, a charming city known for its rich history and scenic landscapes. We invite you to explore and experience the beauty and culture of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zhulyany Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zhulyany Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gostomel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Gostomel Airport, mainly used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at Boryspil Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
